#include <iostream> #include <vector> #include <memory> #include <cstdio> #include <fstream> #include <cassert> #include <functional> struct B { virtual void bar() { std::cout << "B::bar
"; } virtual ~B() = default; }; struct D : B { D() { std::cout << "D::D
"; } ~D() { std::cout << "D::~D
"; } void bar() override { std::cout << "D::bar
"; } }; // æ¶ˆè´¹ unique_ptr çš„å‡½æ•°èƒ½ä»¥å€¼æˆ–ä»¥å³å€¼å¼•ç”¨æ¥æ”¶å®ƒ std::unique_ptr<D> pass_through(std::unique_ptr<D> p) { p->bar(); return p; } void close_file(std::FILE* fp) { std::fclose(fp); } int main() { std::cout << "unique ownership semantics demo
"; { auto p = std::make_unique<D>(); // p æ˜¯å æœ‰ D çš„ unique_ptr auto q = pass_through(std::move(p)); assert(!
